API Reference¶

Math Utilities¶

Core math utilities.

This module provides small reusable math helpers.

mathutils.core.add(a: float, b: float) → float¶

Add two numbers.

Parameters:

  • a – First number

  • b – Second number

Returns:

Sum of a and b

mathutils.core.factorial(n: int) → int¶

Compute the factorial of a non-negative integer.

Parameters:

n – Non-negative integer

Raises:

ValueError – If n is negative

Returns:

n factorial
